title: Measurement system: weekly GEO run and report
content:
Measurement system: weekly GEO run and report

Set a weekly test routine using your prompt set and log results.

Learning goal

  • Schedule the weekly GEO test run.
  • Create a report template.

Why it matters

  • No measurement, no proof of progress.
  • Shows consistency and errors.

Explanation

  • Use the prompt set (best/vs/policy).
  • Measure: inclusion, citation, consistency, AI referral KPIs.
  • Log changes.

Examples

  • Good: weekly report: which prompts mention your store, linked or not.
  • Poor: “Feels better” with no record.

Guided exercise (10–15 min)

  1. Create a report template: Prompt | Inclusion | Citation | Consistency | Notes.
  2. Schedule the weekly run (day, owner).

Independent exercise (5–10 min)

Fill 5 prompts and note results.

Self-check

  • Template ready.
  • Schedule set.
  • First 5 measurements logged.

Optional deepening

  • Measurement tools: https://clarity.microsoft.com/
